H0.text: The 'Black Caps' is the nickname for which team in sport. New Zealand Cricket Team

H1.text: The 'Black Caps' is the nickname for which team in sport. Chicago Bears

H2.text: The 'Black Caps' is the nickname for which team in sport. Boston Bruins

H3.text: The 'Black Caps' is the nickname for which team in sport. BlackCaps

A4.text: The New Zealand cricket team became known as the Black Caps in January 1998, after its sponsor at the time, Clear Communications, held a competition to choose a name for the team.
